Environment Object: the North Central Texas Council of Governments (NCTCOG) GeoData warehouse
System Requirements: Software Requirements Specification (SRS)
implements a repository for traffic data
provides a mechanism to exchange device control information
will be implemented using the evolving ITS Traffic Management Data Dictionary (TMDD) standard
create a system that is reusable for other ITS application areas
provide the State of Texas with a baseline system that can be cost effectively extended in the future
must interconnect several dissimilar traffic management systems
be utilized in a number of configurations
multiple instances of a building block can be deployed
based on the ITS standards
will not utilize the project defined protocol but will be moved “into” the cloud
Center-to-Center project
distinguish its requirements from the requirements of other ITS systems
